fields.name: Men's KIIKII™ T-Shirt
fields.description: This beige T-shirt features a bold blue graphic of a Maneki-neko (beckoning cat), symbolizing good luck, with the text 'KIIKII™' and Japanese characters meaning 'Believe in God.' The design is framed by dynamic lines and the word 'ORIGINAL' in bold letters, making it a stylish choice for casual and streetwear looks.

fields.name: Mens V-Tee
fields.description: an oversized black T-shirt with a bold, dripping yellow and orange 'V' graphic on the back

fields.name: Black AF-1
fields.description: A black AF-1 sneaker with a black sole and a black upper.
